thread.section_title: Family Nation Recensioni| Recensioni dei clienti per Family Nation | www.family-nation.it | 3 di 122
thread.title: Zeta
thread.title_full: Family Nation recensione scritta da Zeta

author: Zeta
title: Zeta
text:
It's absolutly comfy to use for both parent and child. I've bought it purposely to be able to stand for hours watching an event carrying my 2 yo son without worrying to get back-ache, and this product works as it should be.
The size is just perfect for baby and toddler even without adaptor (similar products from other brands usually fits well only for baby or only for toddler though it says they fit for children from 2,5-15 kg) .
